error.discovery_failed: Failed to discover DALI gateways on the network
error.no_devices_found: No DALI gateways found on the network

data_description.selected_gateway: Choose the DALI gateway to add to Home Assistant

select_gateway.description: Select the DALI gateway you want to configure.
select_gateway.title: Select DALI gateway

user.description:
**Three-step process:**

1. Ensure the gateway is powered and on the same network.
2. Select **Submit** to start discovery (searches for up to 3 minutes)
3. While discovery is in progress, press the **Reset** button on your DALI gateway device **once**.

The gateway will respond immediately after the button press.
user.title: Set up DALI Center gateway
